metadata.title: CVE-2020-14409 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
SDL (Simple DirectMedia Layer) through 2.0.12 has an Integer Overflow (andresultant SDL_memcpy heap corruption) in SDL_BlitCopy invideo/SDL_blit_copy.c via a crafted .BMP file.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-14409` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libsdl2-2.0-0 - 2.0.8+dfsg1-1ubuntu1.18.04.4+esm1
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: libsdl2 package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.0.8+dfsg1-1ubuntu1.18.04.4+esm1').
